attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/HCGLearning|@HCGLearning>: <https://twitter.com/offcourse_|@offcourse_> In my experience, video and game-based learning is the trend most people are trying right now.  I am seeing a rise in adaptive learning (designing materials based on need/knowledge gap).  I hear a lot of talk about AR/VR, but implementation is limited.
attachments.text: <https://twitter.com/offcourse_|@offcourse_> In my experience, video and game-based learning is the trend most people are trying right now.  I am seeing a rise in adaptive learning (designing materials based on need/knowledge gap).  I hear a lot of talk about AR/VR, but implementation is limited.
